title: Debt Collectors?
question: Is there a law in regards to Debt Collector predating a letter to the 1st and the letter was mailed out on the 24th? Also I was checking my credit report and saw that I was put on collections the collection agency never sent me no letter, this is in California
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Credit score,Credit,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,State, local, and municipal law,Subpoena
answers: Creditors rights governed by date letter sent, not prior dtae listed in letter.
